Comments_List: I learned about a bunch of topics affecting citizens of East Africa. I learned about the History of Kiswahili, Literature, Development, and the health of communities.
This course has an amazing professor. This course could be improved if we did more grammar review and speaking practice.
Assignments could have been posted on canvas to make for clearer communication.

While beginning and intermediate swahili teach grammar and vocabulary directly, this course uses exclusively discussion and reading to try to improve fluency. I think there were still aspects of grammar and such that we should have gone over directly. We advanced into complex discussion too quickly and I became lost.
I would recommend this to a student who has passed L4 Kiswahili and is looking to keep up their language skills.
I enjoyed intermediate and beginner much more, as much as I wanted to enjoy advanced. Still great to have Kiarie as a teacher though.
